attributes.action: Have All Cafcass Offices Shut Down Permanently
attributes.additional_details:
I have numerous recordings of Cafcass lying infront of witnesses, for legal reasons I cannot go into case detail but these people lie,deceive and manipulate on a massive scale.
Not just me but hundreds of families have been affected by these people.
Facebook: 'Cafcass are corrupt' hundreds of people affected by this scrupulous organisation.
You Tube: https://youtu.be/cAnLnnJ82_o
You Tube: https://youtu.be/AZxYgXib_lw
You Tube: https://youtu.be/r5SUB8FO0wQ
You Tube: https://youtu.be/femKMbmQ-io
attributes.background:
Cafcass in 2010 were stated by Ofsted to be 'unfit' for purpose.
Until this day social workers for Cafcass are cutting corners with their work, endangering the lives of children, not looking into full FACTS, not dealing with complaints adequately, writing bias and falsified reports.
